New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded his league-leading 15th triple-double of the season and the 145th of his career.
Russell Westbrook added 25 points, 11 rebounds, and 10 assists, extending his NBA record with 202 triple-doubles, three of which have come this season.
Key Match Events: The Nuggets led by six at halftime and expanded their lead throughout the third quarter.
The Nets mounted a comeback in the fourth quarter but couldn't overcome the Nuggets' lead.
Jamal Murray didn't play in the second half due to a left knee soreness.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets have won six of their past eight games.
The Nets have lost four in a row and seven of eight games.
Others: The game was played at the Denver Nuggets' home arena.
